mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.* , rownum AS rn FROM (SELECT b.* , u.u_nickname FROM user_tbl u, board_tbl b WHERE u.u_member_id = b.u_member_id ORDER BY b_num DESC) A ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT b.* , u.u_nickname FROM user_tbl u, board_tbl b WHERE u.u_member_id = b.u_member_id AND b.b_num = #{b_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recommend_tbl(rec_num, u_member_id, b_num) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(rec_num)+1, 1) FROM recommend_tbl), #{u_member_id}, #{b_num})
